snippet: A Beijing court convicted 10 people for using secret jails to detain citizens, state-run media outlets initially reported. By the end of the day, the article was gone from most Web sites.
abstract: News article published by score of state-run news media outlets in China about court sentencing 10 people to jail for illegally detaining and assaulting group of citizens, is apparently too politically discomfiting to survive; article is deleted from most Web sites, and court employee insists that news accounts of the verdict were false.
lead_paragraph: A Beijing court convicted 10 people for using secret jails to detain citizens, state-run media outlets initially reported. By the end of the day, the article was gone from most Web sites.

headline.seo: Chinese Media Partly Retreat After Reports of Court Verdict
headline.main: Chinese Media Retreat After Reports of Unexpected ‘Black Jail’ Verdict
headline.print_headline: Chinese Media Partly Retreat on Reports of a Verdict
